name: saucedemoautomation
description: Automation Project for Basic Understanding of Cypress.

scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress-regression-pack: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run triggerAllTests-headless && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.cypress-multi-browser: npm run triggerAllTests-headless -- --browser firefox --headed & npm run triggerAllTests-headless -- --browser chrome --headed & npm run triggerAllTests-headless -- --browser electron --headed
scripts.cypress-multi-browser-headless: npm run triggerAllTests-headless -- --browser firefox & npm run triggerAllTests-headless -- --browser chrome & npm run triggerAllTests-headless -- --browser electron
scripts.cypress-multi-browser-regression: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run cypress-multi-browser && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.generate-allure-reports: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.cypress-regression-allure: npm run testcases-allure && npm run generate-allure-reports

author: Taimoor Pasha
